string.text: Strelok, you seem well. Never a moment's rest I see.
It's good to see you again, I am glad you decided to lend a hand!

Yes... well, Ghost was convincing enough... I assume you were informed about the Military blockade around Pripyat? Even though I can survive the harshest conditions the Zone can unleash without worries, I must concede that being laden with lead will end me.
But you know a way past the surface, through the underground tunnels?

Yes. It is a route that we used to travel North to the ghost city... but the psy-emissions of the Scorcher boosted after our third trip. The tunnels were then flooded with deadly psy-emissions where no normal man can survive. But now, I sense it is clear of such dangers.
I don't remember any of this clearly. My memories are still slowly coming back to me, one by one. Nothing is really clear... Anyhow, what's the plan?
There is a system of natural and unnatural tunnels that will lead you from here to the center of Pripyat. They have long been unused. Many mutants nest in the darkness, waiting for a easy prey.

Alas I can only take you to the entrance of the tunnel system, that's where I will depart. There are many stalkers that require my help navigating the Zone. I won't let them be victims of foolish deaths due to inexperience. Stay close brother, there are strange anomalies everywhere.
Let's not waste any time then.
This is the place, the entrance to the tunnels. This is where I get off; the way forward is for you to figure out.
I appreciate the help. What can you tell me about the tunnels?
The tunnel system is vast - Daedalus' labyrinth. Keep track of your surroundings, move wisely, and reach the underground railway. Once you see the tracks, you're on the right path.
Won't be a walk in the park, but I'll do it. There's no other way.
Indeed there isn't. Remember to trust your instincts; they are your closest friend.
My pleasure. But be careful Strelok, I feel as if a great horror awaits in your near future. Be safe.
